mapper.select: select distinct aut_tservicio.*, aut_tmodulo.*, aut_tsurl.* from aut_turol, aut_tsrol, aut_tservicio, aut_tmodulo, aut_tsurl where urol_usua = #{usua_usua} and urol_rol = srol_rol and servicio_servicio = srol_servicio and surl_servicio = servicio_servicio and surl_tipo = 'P' and modulo_modulo = servicio_modulo and srol_visible = 'S' order by servicio_modulo, servicio_orden asc

select distinct aut_tservicio.*, aut_tmodulo.* from aut_turol, aut_tsrol, aut_tservicio, aut_tmodulo, aut_tsurl where urol_usua = #{usua_usua} and urol_rol = srol_rol and servicio_servicio = srol_servicio and surl_servicio = servicio_servicio and modulo_modulo = servicio_modulo and surl_url = #{url}

select distinct aut_tmodulo.* from aut_turol, aut_tsrol, aut_tservicio, aut_tmodulo, aut_tsurl where urol_usua = #{usua_usua} and urol_rol = srol_rol and servicio_servicio = srol_servicio and surl_servicio = servicio_servicio and modulo_modulo = servicio_modulo and srol_visible = 'S'
select usua_usua, usua_mail from aut_tusua where usua_usua = #{usua_usua}
select distinct ur.urol_rol from aut_turol ur where ur.urol_usua = #{usua_usua}
